GSD.description:
bfq: fix use-after-free in bfq_dispatch_request

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit 080665e2c3cbfc68359b9a348a3546ed9b908e7a. For more details please see the references link.
